DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study investigate social standing game Monopoly may influence behavior .
DOC.detailed_description: Participants ask fill questionnaires/surveys health measure collect throughout study visit . These health measure include : blood pressure , heart rate , height/weight , waist circumference , percent body fat , rest metabolic rate , salivary cortisol . Breakfast provide 40-minute game Monopolyâ„¢ play , lunch provide game . Participants give accelerometer measure movement , food diary use 24-hour period . Once 24-hour monitoring period complete , participant finish study activity . The accelerometer food diary return either bring investigator mail item back investigator .
DOC.criteria: Hispanic American adolescent bear United States Have play Monopoly Clinical depression A diagnosis cardiovascular disease ( active within past 6 month ) , cancer ( active within past 2 year , except nonmelanoma skin cancer ) , diabetes ( type 1 2 ) , active chronic infection , gastrointestinal disease , active kidney disease , lung disease , uncontrolled psychiatric disease An eat disorder severely restrict diet Use tobacco product Substance abuse disorder Take medication know affect appetite body composition Participation weightreduction program , weightloss diet , special diet within previous 3 month Experience weight loss gain 10 pound body weight past 6 month reason except postpartum weight loss Current/Anticipation pregnancy study Currently nursing within 6 week complete nursing
